short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically converts profile into a polished resume

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create a professional resume in just a few clicks! This extension helps you convert your LinkedIn profile into a stylish and well-structured CV in .docx format. Perfect for anyone looking to quickly prepare a resume for job applications or academic purposes.

Key Features:
    - Convert your LinkedIn profile data into a CV format.
    - Download your resume as an editable .docx file. 
    - Simple and user-friendly interface for a seamless experience.
